effect_entries.effect:
Held: Raises the holder's Accuracy by 20% when it goes last.
Ingame description is incorrect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Provides a 1/5 (20%) boost in accuracy if the holder moves after the target.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせた　ポケモンが　相手よりも
行動するのが　遅いとき
技が　命中しやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after its target
moves, its accuracy will be boosted.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Se chi ce l’ha attacca dopo il nemico,
la sua precisione aumenta.

Potencia la Velocidad de base, pero reduce la
Velocidad en combate. Debe llevarla un
Pokémon.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Agiert das Ziel zuerst,
erhöht sich die Genauigkeit des Trägers.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la Précision du porteur
s’il attaque après l’ennemi.

지니게 한 포켓몬이 상대보다도
행동하는 것이 늦을 때
기술이 명중하기 쉬워진다.

もたせた　ポケモンが　あいてよりも
こうどうするのが　おそいとき
わざが　めいちゅう　しやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after its
target, its accuracy will be boosted.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after its
target, its accuracy will be boosted.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la Précision
du porteur s’il attaque après l’ennemi.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after the foe, its
accuracy will be boosted.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after the foe, its
accuracy will be boosted.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after the foe, its
critical-hit ratio will be boosted.
